message.content:
cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.NA, cs.SC, cs.SY

Reasoning: 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper proposes a new solution method for systems of linear equations, which involves recursive algorithms. This falls under the scope of data structures and algorithms.
- cs.IT (Information Theory): The paper discusses the complexity of the proposed method, which is the same as matrix multiplication. This relates to information theory, which deals with the quantification, storage, and communication of information.
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis): The paper proposes a numerical method for solving systems of linear equations. This falls under the scope of numerical analysis, which deals with the development and analysis of numerical algorithms for solving mathematical problems.
- cs.SC (Symbolic Computation): The paper discusses the solution of systems of linear equations in commutative integral domains, which can be related to symbolic computation, which deals with the manipulation of mathematical expressions and symbols.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes a method for solving systems of linear equations, which can be applied in systems and control theory, which deals with the analysis and design of systems that can be modeled by linear equations.
